mapper.select: SELECT a.subject_no subjectNo ,a.member_id memberId ,b.language_name languageName ,a.curriculum_title curriculumTitle ,a.start_day startDay ,a.end_day endDay FROM curriculum AS a INNER JOIN language AS b ON a.language_no = b.language_no WHERE a.subject_no = #{subject_no} LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
